document_data.name: Fireshear Inn
document_data.mainbody: '''Fireshear Inn''' was an inn located in the city of [[Fireshear]] in the early 14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Location: This inn was located in the north-eastern side of Fireshear, across from [[Bahriit's General Equipment Shop]].
document_data.History:
In the {{YearlinkName|1358}}, after having finally cleared their names to the [[Lords' Alliance]], the [[Heroes of Ascore]] traveled to Fireshear in search of the legendary hoard of [[Freezefire]]. While there they were able to find refuge within the walls of the Fireshear Inn.

Sometime between 1358 and [[1365 DR]] the inn presumably shut down, for while there [[Volothamp Geddarm]] remarked in his book ''[[Volo's Guide to the North (in-universe)|Volo's Guide to the North]]'' that the mining settlement was completely lacking in any sort of inn.<ref>
